title: Hector and the Search for Happiness Trailer (Simon Pegg Comedy - 2014)
description: Simon Pegg is a quirky psychiatrist who has become increasingly tired of his humdrum life. He hasn't really tasted life ! ➨ Join us on Facebook http://bit.ly/Inspiring-Cinema ✓ Subscribe Here & NOW ➨ http://bit.ly/Movietrailers ★ Best COMEDIES are HERE ➨ http://bit.ly/Best-Comedies Hector (Simon Pegg) is a quirky psychiatrist who has become increasingly tired of his humdrum life. As he tells his girlfriend, Clara (Rosamund Pike), he feels like a fraud: he hasn't really tasted life, and yet he's offering advice to patients who are just not getting any happier. So Hector decides to break out of his deluded and routine driven life. Armed with buckets of courage and child-like curiosity, he embarks on a global quest in hopes of uncovering the elusive secret formula for true happiness. And so begins a larger than life adventure with riotously funny results. Based on the world-wide best-selling novel of the same name, Hector and the Search for Happiness is a rich, exhilarating, and hilarious tale from director Peter Chelsom, starring Simon Pegg, Toni Collette, Rosamund Pike, Stellan Skarsgard, Jean Reno and Christopher Plummer. Hector and the Search for Happiness Trailer A Movie directed by Peter Chelsom Cast : Simon Pegg, Toni Collette, Rosamund Pike, Stellan Skarsgård, Jean Reno, Christopher Plummer Release Date : In Theaters September 19th, 2014 Hector and the Search for Happiness Trailer © 2014 Relativity Studios ✓ Subscribe now 2 catch the best trailers and the latest HD official movie trailer, film clip, scene and video !
